nodes.text: PDA6 was a PD Lurrian protocol droid, a series of protocol droid designed by Cybot Galactica. PDA6 was stationed aboard the Ithorian Herdship of an Ithorian botanist named Master Zorneth. PDA6 partnered with fellow protocol droid C-3PO on a mission to bring down the force field which protected the fortress of Craw, the dictator of Targonn.
